metadata.feature_description: Manages directories that should be included in search crawling operations

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View list of all included directories

steps.action: Navigate to Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Included Directories section is visible with list of directories
steps.actual: Included Directories section displayed with 'Badges/' directory in the list, with Add Directory button and delete icons visible

steps.action: Verify directory list and UI elements
steps.expected: Directory list shows path names with delete icons
steps.actual: Directory 'Badges/' displayed with trash icon for deletion. Add Directory button available with folder picker dropdown.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add directory to included list using folder picker

steps.expected: Folder picker opens showing available folders
steps.actual: Folder picker opened showing folder tree with Site Root and subfolders: Badges, Groups, Images, PermissionsTestFolder, Templates, Users, WorkflowTestFolder

steps.action: Select 'Images' folder from the folder picker
steps.expected: Images folder is selected in the dropdown
steps.actual: Images folder was successfully selected and displayed in the folder picker dropdown

steps.action: Click Save button to add the directory
steps.expected: Directory is added to the included list
steps.actual: Images directory was successfully added to the Included Directories list alongside Badges/

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add duplicate directory and verify error

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' and select 'Images' folder (already in list)
steps.expected: Images folder can be selected again
steps.actual: Images folder was selected in the folder picker

steps.action: Click Save to attempt adding duplicate directory
steps.expected: Error message displayed indicating duplicate directory
steps.actual: Error notification displayed: 'Directory duplicated. This directory Images/ is already added'. Server returned 500 status correctly preventing the duplicate.

steps.action: View current list showing Badges/ and Images directories
steps.expected: Both directories visible with delete icons
steps.actual: Both Badges/ and Images directories displayed in the list with trash icons

steps.action: Click delete (trash) icon for Images directory
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog displayed asking: 'Are you sure you want to delete Images?' with No and Yes buttons

steps.expected: Directory is removed from the list
steps.actual: Images directory was successfully removed from the Included Directories list. Only Badges/ remains.

observations: The folder picker component uses a tree structure to display available folders from the portal's file system
Deletion includes a confirmation dialog as a safety measure to prevent accidental deletions
The duplicate directory validation is handled server-side and returns a clear error message
The Excluded Directories section shares the same UI component pattern as Included Directories
Based on code review: No explicit confirmation dialog component exists in the code - the delete action appears to be immediate with server-side validation
